description: Submission of details pursuant to condition 4 (Construction Management Plan), condition 5 (Detailed drawings for the new sash windows) and condition 6 (Materials for all external finishes) of Planning Permission ref 19/00536/FUL (Erection of part single, part two storey rear extension and alterations to front elevation) dated 02/08/2019
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are fully discharged.
The applicant is informed that the submitted details are hereby approved.

Please provide a revised copy of block plan scaled 1:500 showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.Please note the block plan to show the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.
